##Description
Save posteriors. Re-scale samples back to original variances.

##Usage
save_posterior_samples(sp_num, params, Posterior, resid, fixed_effects, genetic_effects, Factors, interaction_effects)

##Arguments
sp_num\
params\
Posterior\
resid\
fixed_effects\
genetic_effects\
Factors\
interaction_effects

##Value
Posterior
